strongs_def: a gate, i.e. the leaf or wing of a folding entrance (literally or figuratively)
outline:
1. a gate
    1. of the larger sort
      1. in the wall of either a city
      2. a palace
      3. a town
      4. the temple
      5. a prison
    2. the gates of hell (likened to a vast prison)
    3. metaph. the access or entrance into any state
